Articles.Content:
44. There needs to be a really cool looking nebula somewhere in the Kerbol system.

This really isn't such a bad idea.

Edited May 10, 2013 by UAL002
225: Kerbal Conspiracy Theriosts that thing UFO's are real and that the Mun landing was fake.

226: When you start a game there should be no stars in the sky, instead each time a Kerbal dies a star is created.

227: Whiskey for my Kerbals...

228: ...Beer for number 12
229. More solar systems please

230. Ice that melts.

231. other things that melt.

232. Melted Cheese sandwich.
233. My kerbals are displayed green. Please fix.
234 : Asteroids that go pop like a balloon when you plant a flag in them
235 : a camera so kerbals could take pictures and bring them back to show the world
236: Space zombies that can kill your Kerbals on EVA in space, and you have an AK-47 for defense.
237: Game is lagging with a 100Mb RAM please fix
238: Realistic biomes on Kerbin with actual physical flora and fauna, such as tundras, actual deserts, rainforests, plains, etc.

239: Bones for Kerbals, where of they break one of them they die instantly. You can break bones by landing too hard or just random

thumbs up if u agree

24. Why can't there be a monolith in jool orbit

2001:a space odyssey!!!!!!
240: Interactive mission control.
241: change kerbals to humans

239: Bones for Kerbals, where of they break one of them they die instantly. You can break bones by landing too hard or just random

thumbs up if u agree

Hha i see skates bone breaking system before me, and then have to rescue the hurt kerbal which drags along hahah

24. Why can't there be a Monolith in Jool orbit, in the middle of nowhere? Of course we'll be able to see and find it!

Here you go:

242: make ksp a tern style game.

243:change all the font into comic sands!

244: wi ned a enjin wit lik 200000 isp so tht wi cn go to mon wit only 1 staj

(Horrendous spelling intentional.)

245: A certain Presidential Kerbal who cancels the space program which indicates the end of the game.

246: Space Stations that leak Ammonia from the solar panels.
247: A kerbal graveyard!
248: A government that will cut funding of your program to the point where you can't afford to send anything above LKO.
249: Add Dyson sphere functionality, kthx!

250. (Yay, round number!)

The planets should NOt Be HOLLOW!

I want to see the core when my kerbins fall under thee ground. I want magma under there, and maybe I can dig up precious minerals.
251. I want Kerbals to meet other kerbals and have private wars and countries and invade galaxies and universes and whatever else you can think of.
